name: LimeTorrents Dark & Clean 2022
description: Dark & clean light-weight theme for limetorrents.pro, including some ad-suppression for those not using a dedicated Ad-Blocker.
additional_info: Features • Dark backgrounds • More modern look & feel for tables, borders and the pagination-buttons • Fixed irregular padding • Suppression of most ads and some useless-placeholders like the page-footer • Light-weight; no CSS regex or wildcards selectors Change Log v2021-08: Added support for limetorrents.pro as the primary FQDN. v2020-09: Fixed the disappearing 'direct download' icon introduced with the latest site update. v2020-08: Slightly updated fonts, pagination-buttons, hover effects and Ad-suppression. v2020-04: Made the pagination button-spacing more touch-friendly. v2020-01: Suppressed even more Ads. v2019-03: Darkened comments-area.
